attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We all know the Fuel Costs are rising.
There are a few Petitions going around but hopefully the more the better.
Please join me in this Petition to Lower Fuel Costs so they are more affordalble and more acceptable.  
If they carry on going up we will not be able to afford to get to work which means we will not be able to pay bills, buy food, ect....
Thank you for your time

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/oilsnotwell/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
